dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: No -- something real.  Something no one else knows.

dialogue.speaker: PATRICK
dialogue.text: You're sweet.  And sexy.  And completely hot for me.

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: You're amazingly self-assured. Has anyone ever told you that?

dialogue.speaker: PATRICK
dialogue.text: Go to the prom with me
